ygData.subject: Re: Staff of Observe/FBR/ROO
ygData.msgSnippet: Najera is usually spawn with 2-3 magicians or a higher lvl magician will take her place when she goes shopping. She can harm touch meh? Never see her do it
ygData.messageBody:
Najera is usually spawn with 2-3 magicians or a higher lvl magician will take
her place when she goes shopping.

She can harm touch meh? Never see her do it before. I just dizzying draught and
feedback her, melee a bit with my staff and sent her to heavens with 3 anarcy
shots(288 dmg each + interrupt spell casting) while her little friends standing
there sleeping. Think she might have been change since the last time I fough her
(2-3 months back)

Oracle is definately high 30s, not mid 30s, cons dangerous blue to lvl
39(meaning should be lvl 35-38). He only has 1 kaki who yells a lot. Place
freaking empty most of the time.

Staff of observers for hell sake is NOT a DROPPED item(and on the same note,
Skull of J'tendra does not combine with a RTS to produce a Staff of Writhing),
it is a QUEST REWARD. You need Borxx optic lense/retina for the quest. Tired of
listening to rumors on staffs.

The goon at paw drops RTS.

Anyway, Borxx level has been raise during one of the last patch and spawns
mainly in mid 30s these days and is a MISS.

Broxx

Sabella Anna Estasis, who is now rolling in her coffin, unable to rest
peacefully.

Chen Lizhi wrote:

> From: "Chen Lizhi" <polarcoordinates@...>
>
> If you want to fight Najena, you better get 2-3 nukers along. She got some
> kakis guarding here, Necro or Mage and each of them have a pet.So makes a
> grand total of abt. 5-7 MOBs in total. Plus, last I heard, she can cast and
> melee also, plus she can HarmTouch ppl. Sometimes she can do up to 4-7 HT in
> a round alone, but rare lar. Average is abt. 2-3. Want to kill her better
> get some REAL serious firepower to kill her hor, HP wise is around
> 2000-2500(estimate). Expect to lose a few ppl. in fighting her, her HT kicks
> some serious butt.
> The Oracle in OOT is around 34-36. Don't think of soloing him, he got
> someone protecting him one, abt. 30-31 level guy. Small fries I don't know,
> but I think a few level 20ish MOB around the oracle also.
> FBR is a rare drop on Najena(I think) So hunting J.Boots that time also can
> hunt for FBR.
> Staff of Observer? A rare spawn EvilEye in the King's room in RunnyEye has
> it on him occasionally. He can charm, summon pet and get all his Goblins
> kakis to help him kill you. Level around low 30s. Not sure, but don't think
> of soloing him.
> This one is rumor, there is another way of getting StaffofObserver. Go to
> Paw underwater room. Kill the HighShaman there and wait for the Drow Nixx to
> spawn. If you see the Drow wearing a staff, if may be StaffofObserver. Just
> rumor only hor, try if you have the time. DrowNixx is around 20-24 in level
> and he got some bitching Rune 2 or 3 protecting him. I tried to kill it at
> 18 with 3 others. All end up Gating out :p
>
